content:
It's always great to get recommendations from friends and colleagues, especially when it comes to shoes! Rachel might have some valuable insights about the brand and the quality of their shoes. And who knows, you might find the perfect pair of black stilettos that you've been looking for!

Office parties can be a great way to catch up with colleagues and friends, and it's awesome that you and Rachel had a chance to chat about shoes. I'm sure you'll have a great time checking out the brand and possibly finding a new addition to your shoe collection!

Remember to ask Rachel about her experience with the brand, the quality of the materials, and the comfort level of the shoes. You might also want to ask if she has any promo codes or discounts that you could use.

Have fun shoe shopping, and I hope you find the perfect pair!
